description: Side Garden - (left of the boundary gate on Woronzow Road):  T1:  Mature Lime:  Approximately 13.00m.  Reduce lateral and sub-lateral branches growing toward the stand of silver birches south side of the crown by up to approximately 1.50m.  Remove major dead wood.T2:  Mature Sycamore:  Approximately 13.00m.  Reduce lateral and sub-lateral branches overhanging the roof by approximately 1.20m to clear.  Remove dead wood.Reason:  General maintenance to increase light levels and provide continued clearance for the birches.Rear of No.24 - (overhanging No.25):T3:  False Acacia:  Approximately 11.00m.  Reduce lateral and sub-lateral branches growing toward and over the rear garden of No.25 by up to approximately 1.20-1.50m.T4:  Walnut:  Approximately 6.00m.  Tip prune lateral and sub-lateral branches overhanging No.25 by approximately 1.20m.Reason:  General maintenance to help control encroachment.
